int *  err

Create an array of new vertices at specified coordinates.

Create an array of new vertices at specified coordinates. Value of storage_order must be either iBase_INTERLEAVED or iBase_BLOCKED.

Parameters:
instance  [in] iMesh instance handle
num_verts  [in] Number of new vertices to be created
storage_order  [in] Storage order of coordinates in new_coords array (see iBase_StorageOrder)
new_coords  [in] Array of coordinates of new vertices. Should be G*num_verts in length where G is geometric dimension of the mesh.
new_coords_size  [in] Number of coordinates in new_coords array, should
new_vertex_handles  [in,out] Pointer to array of new vertex handles Array pointer, allocated and occupied sizes argument trio)
new_vertex_handles_allocated  [in,out] Pointer to allocated size of
new_vertex_handles_size  [out] Pointer to occupied size of
err  [out] Returned Error status (see iBase_ErrorType)

const int  vertex_handles_size,
const int  storage_order,
double **  coords,
int *  coords_allocated,
int *  coords_size,
int *  err 
)

Get coordinates of specified vertices.

Get coordinates of specified vertices. Coordinates are returned in the storage order indicated by the storage_order argument.

Parameters:
instance  [in] iMesh instance handle
vertex_handles  [in] Array of mesh vertex handles whose coordinates are being requested
vertex_handles_size  [in] Number of vertices in vertex_handles array
storage_order  [in] Requested storage order of returned coordinates (see iBase_StorageOrder)
coords  [in,out] Pointer to array of coordinates returned from function Array pointer, allocated and occupied sizes argument trio)
coords_allocated  [in,out] Pointer to allocated size of coords array
coords_size  [out] Pointer to occupied size of coords array
err  [out] Returned Error status (see iBase_ErrorType)

const iBase_EntityHandle *  vertex_handles,
const int  vertex_handles_size,
const int  storage_order,
const double *  new_coords,
const int  new_coords_size,
int *  err 
)

Set coordinates for an array of vertices.

Set coordinates for an array of vertices. Specified storage order must be either iBase_INTERLEAVED or iBase_BLOCKED, and indicates order of x, y, and z coordinates in coordinate array.

Parameters:
instance  [in] iMesh instance handle
vertex_handles  [in] Array of vertex handles
vertex_handles_size  [in] Number of vertex handles in array
storage_order  [in] Storage order of coordinates in coordinate array
new_coords  [in] Coordinate array
new_coords_size  [in] Size of coordinate array; should be
err  [out] Returned Error status (see iBase_ErrorType)
